column5: Well I fished Omemee yesterday, and did ok.  I caught a 21 inch large mouth and a small one.  I could have had a great day if I didn't lose a a muskie and three others due to a snapped line.  I was cursing the trilene line quite a bit.  Anyway, the only camera we had was an old style snap and shoot.  I will definitely be heading back with some better line.  I was using 8lb and 14lb.  Ty
Good to hear there are still some good sized bass in there despite all the increased angling pressure.
